thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com | 3 of 141
thread.title: Krysti

author: Krysti
title: Krysti
text: Our dog is like a family member. When we were unexpectedly in need of a day sitter, out of town, we found one with great reviews through Rover.com. She had great reviews and repeat customers, we were able to book and pay securely within minutes. And we were so pleased with the care our sweet dog got all day! It's like he had a day at Disneyland! I won't hesitate to use Rover.com again, and I highly recommend this service!
